mapper.sql: USER_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, RIGHTS, YICODE, BIRTHDATEDATE, SEX, EDUCATION, NPLACE, HIREDATE, ROLE_ID, LAST_LOGIN, IP, STATUS, BZ, SKIN, EMAIL, NUMBER, PHONE, PK_SOBOOKS
mapper.select: select a.USER_ID,a.NAME,a.ROLE_ID,a.PHONE,a.RIGHTS,b.PHOTO0 from sys_user as a left join sys_userphoto as b on a.USERNAME=b.USERNAME where PK_SOBOOKS=#{PK_SOBOOKS}
